Text: Wow! The first episode. I can't wait to see it again after, what? forty nine years? Seems like it was only yesterday.....sigh!

I gotta say.....I am impressed with the video and sound quality. I was concerned that since this was such a small file (187 MiB), the quality would be substandard. 

I had nothing to be worried about. 

Audio/10
Video/10

175MB is standard size for a half-hour show
minus commercials.

I added the coming attractions at 12MB which
is enough for 30 seconds. :)
